highlights: Architeched and built an Admin Service for both BE and FE using Python, AWS Lambda Functions, Angular 12, MongoDB, and Auth0 API
Transitioned our backend into our new stack which consisted of Graphql, nodejs, typescript, AWS CDK, and postgreSQL
Part of the team that greenfield a new project using AngularJS 12, Ngrx, and Apollo Graphql
Implemented many AWS infrastructure components using CDK SDK such as State Machines, S3, API Gateway, Redis, and SQS
Helped build out our backend testing environment using Jest
Improved our local environment using Docker
Worked with GraphQL and Ruby on Rails to migrate a database from Google Cloud Datastore
Worked with Java, Maven, and Google Cloud Platform to service more than 30,000 people simantaneously on both a web and mobile apps
Improved and refactor the integration PHP codebase connected to the Iterable.com API
Helped greenfield a new project using AngularJS 9 and Ngrx
Worked with Django and python 2.7/3.5 on the backend to interact with the pinterest and snapchat social media ads api
Made the activation app faster and more responsive by transitioning our BackboneJS components to EmberJS
Deployed and worked on multiple micro-services using Agile Methods and technologies such as chef, jenkins, aws (RDS and EC2), sentry, and git

education.area: Physical Science [concentration in Mathematics, Physics, and Computer Science]
